nodes.text: Revitalize was a light side Force technique that revitalized an exhausted, wounded or, unconscious user, or whoever the user directed it at. Being a Force-based power, it did not work on non-organics such as droids.
Kreia used this power to save Hanharr on Nar Shaddaa, and Colonel Tobin on Onderon. Meetra Surik may also have mastered this particular Force power.
